says torrent is nonexistent

Not to attack the uploader, who after all warned us what he was uploading. BUT, these are in a cruddy old WMV format that is patented by Microsoft, so freeware remuxing programs can't even remux it, ie turn it into a useful format like mkv or avi. So you are pretty much stuck with WMV v.1 videos if you download this. 

My computer will play it, but it won't play on my HTPC box, and I guess it won't play on any handheld devices or streamers either. So avoid it unless you are happy with WMVs...
